DOC.brief_summary: This study design investigate safety immunogenicity Chiron 's investigational H. pylorus ( HP3 ) vaccine
DOC.brief_title: Safety Immunogenicity Chiron 's Investigational H. Pylori Vaccine Healthy Adults
DOC.criteria: Healthy Ages 1840 Negative H. pylorus infection Contraception females Present past H. pylorus infection Medically significant gastroduodenal disease Recent corticosteroid use Bleed diathesis Use antibiotic use treat H. pylori infection
